ProductInfo.Features:
GW9016: 16Ch H.264 DVR Central Management System; iPhone Remote View; PTZ Control; Motion detection recording Manual/schedule/Motion Detection Recording Modes; USB backup; Easy navigation in OSD; VGA output to LCD Monitor for better resolution
GW30WD: Professional 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Camera; 700 TV lines; 2.8~12mm varifocal lens; 42pcs IR LED; 115 ft. IR Distance; WDR(Wide Dynamic Range); OSD Menu; Great Image; Great for Entrance.
GW1218-10A Camera Power Box: New Technology; PTC fuse protection for Circuit Short; High Voltage, and Over Current; Consolidate all cameras power (up to 18) to one central location; Heavy duty metal case; LED indicator for each power output.
Package includes: GW9016V - 16 channel network DVR with 2T HDD; CD with manual and software; 10 x GW30WD - 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Camera.
Package includes: 1 x GW1000RG59:1000 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable; GW1218-10A: 1 x 18 ports power box; 10 x Power pigtail (GW098); 20 x GW10009: Twist On BNC Male Connector.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc. GW9016VE20 2T Complete 16-Channel DVR 2THDD with 10x700TVL 1/3-Inch CCDII 12mm Varifocal Outdoor Security CCTV Camera (Black/Grey)
